basics.name: Matias Falconaro
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: As a developer, I'm driven by the excitement of creating meaningful and impactful solutions. Crafting code that not only solves business problems but also brings me joy is at the core of my work. Some of my soft skills are being analytical, adaptable, collaborative, and committed. I also enjoy spending time with my family and friends, cycling, and swimming.

work.name: Scienza Argentina
work.summary: Led automation initiatives using Python and virtualization tools. Integrated OpenAI API for document auditing, prescription analysis, and cross-referencing with lab delivery notes. Developed and consumed APIs using FastAPI. Created comprehensive documentation and training resources. Championed DevOps practices with Git/GitHub and enforced clean architecture through OOP, SOLID principles, and modular design.

work.name: Baitcon SA
work.summary: Designed database schemas using ER diagrams, DDL, and SQL for efficient data storage and retrieval, and developed ETL processes to centralize data from various sources. Built RESTful APIs, integrated AI APIs and MMLs, ensured data security, and collaborated with data analysts, while managing data pipelines, backup strategies, and CI/CD pipelines for backend services.
highlights: Corporate software, automation and pipelining factory

work.name: Freelance web developer
work.summary: Developed and maintained web pages, including landing pages and e-commerce sites, focusing on enterprise clients. Leveraged Python for backend development and the Flask framework for web application interfaces.
highlights: Commercial landing pages development, deployment, hosting, maintenance and improvement

work.name: Pilcomayo SRL
work.summary: Managed and maintained the company's IT infrastructure, including servers, networks, and workstations, ensuring performance, uptime, and secure connectivity through the configuration of routers, switches, firewalls, and VPNs. Provided technical support to employees, handled software installations and updates, managed user accounts and data backup solutions, enforced IT security policies, and coordinated with vendors for hardware and software procurement.

work.name: Etex Group Argentina
work.summary: Configured technical locations and maintenance plans in SAP to support asset management, ensuring efficient scheduling and execution of preventive maintenance tasks. Managed work orders, purchase requests, and equipment master data, while providing user training and support on SAP maintenance functionalities.
highlights: Started the SAP PM module implementation.

projects.name: Reflex-EC2 Toolkit
projects.description: Automation toolkit to launch a production-ready AWS EC2 instance and deploy a Reflex app in Docker with Caddy as the reverse proxy.

projects.name: Local LLM RAG Agent
projects.description: Tool for creating local AI model RAG agents, performing semantic research from custom files, and testing AI models with embeddings-based context.

projects.name: KPI Traking
projects.description: Application for tracking and analyzing daily KPIs of call center agents, enabling monitoring of productivity, efficiency, and goal achievement.

projects.name: PartyPrize API
projects.description: Exposed FastAPI backend for managing guest and prize data for a company event, featuring a lightweight embedded file database and a Swagger interface.

projects.name: Expense manager
projects.description: Desktop CRUD application for managing, tracking, exporting, and visually analyzing financial transactions including expenses and revenues.

projects.name: Investment App
projects.description: Cloud-based application for mass data import, processing, and management of engineering project investment data, integrated for use with SAP Analytics Cloud.

projects.name: GIS ETL pipeline
projects.description: Back-end system to retrieve data from a database and GEOJSON files, process it, and compile into JSON files for geographic project information.

projects.name: Direction mgmt. App
projects.description: Cloud platform for managing the import, export, and monitoring of engineering projects within a corporate enterprise's presidency.

projects.name: DBs ETL Pipeline
projects.description: Executable ETL pipeline for extracting, processing, validating, and transferring data from an Oracle DB to a HANA Cloud DB.

projects.name: Chat AWS
projects.description: Cloud Python application leveraging OpenAI's API models for natural language queries to fetch data from a database.
